labels.name: duplicate

labels.name: wontfix

issues.title: Pre-existing relationship between the Attester and the Verifier
issues.author: ysong02
issues.body:
This issue is based on Michael's comments during the adoption call of the draft (see [here](https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/lake/Yivtuau5Wfm_mtsadp-l2nBXaMo/))

If we assume a pre-existing relationship between the Attester and the Verifier, there is no need to negotiate evidence formats in ead_1 and ead_2. The process can be simplified by sending Evidence directly in ead_3.
Or, optionally including a label in ead_1 to indicate that an attestation is taking place.

issues.title: Completeness of negotiation in Section 5.2.1 Background-check Model
issues.author: ysong02
issues.body:
Based on Michael's comments during the adoption call of the draft (see [here](https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/lake/Yivtuau5Wfm_mtsadp-l2nBXaMo/))

Should clarify what kind of evidence will sent in Section 5.2.1.
Note: The Evidence is sent in message_3 due to privacy considerations.
